Name: Swipe Fruit Smash
About the game: If you like Match 3 games, you need this game in your collection! Use your mouse to swipe through the fruits and collect them all. The game contains 100 levels with exciting achievements. Complete all mission types: - Reach the target score - Gather specific fruits - Remove colored tiles - Collect trophies The game has 2 challenging variations: - Time limits - Move limits Can you complete all 100 levels?
